title: John Taylor on the State of the Economy
description: John Taylor of Stanford University talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the state of the economy. Is the economy recovering? What policies have helped and hurt? Taylor gives his views on both monetary and fiscal policy including the stimulus package passed last year, and current Fed policy. The conversation closes with a discussion of the global economy, particularly Poland and its recent success in avoiding recession.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)

The conversation closes with a discussion of the global economy, particularly Poland and its recent success in avoiding recession.
